channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned furniture and rubbish, 31st July
item.description:
This area is constantly being used as a rubbish dump. Behind the tree there is also more rubbish.

item.title: Large suitcase and big pile of clothes, 31st July
item.description:
A large suitcase and pile of clothes have been fly tipped and left on the pavement. Due to the bad weather the clothes are sodden and blocking the pavement for anyone with a wheelchair, pram etc.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Farleigh Road, Hackney, London
